Author: yuvadeep
Title: [ANN][ICO]Block Bank - bespoke commercial banking
Body: At present days, you can see the crisis occurred on global funding, by which the interest rates for commercial loans in developing countries go beyond, which is allowed in developed countries. Therefore, it creates a gap where independent businesses suffer to start and manage the small-medium business. Funding shows interest in financial and tech institutions, but other industries are not showing interested. As a result, theses lead to decrease from Small to medium enterprises which cover all the important sectors in it.  Blockbank will allow global access to assets-backed low-cost commercial loans in FIAT currency to those countries under developing and developed countries.  All this will help in closing the funding gap and encourages SMEs to flourish across all the sectors.  Blockbank is going to launch a BBRT utility token and these are based on the decentralized token economy.  With the help of BBRT token, they can pay the loan fees. Interbank transactions take more time clearing and making a final settlement, especially takes more time for outside of working hours. Blockchain transactions reduce transaction times to minutes and are ready to handle 24/7.

Title: [ANN][ICO]Block Bank - bespoke commercial banking
Body: Community Update - Listing Information  Hey guys, we have had a crazy week securing key partnerships in Europe and America. Last night we were invited to speak at the LA Token Event in London.  We are happy to announce that deposits are now open with LA Token for BBRT.  LATOKEN is a rapidly growing crypto exchange focusing on liquidity for new tokens they have.  $30m+ daily turnover. More than 80,000 registered traders. 180+ crypto pairs available for trading. 1 million visitors per month.  Please register with LA TOKEN and make your deposits ahead of trading going live on the 29th using the following link if you haven’t already.  Registration  We will be posting more information over the coming days  Thanks again for your support.

Author: Mirkic7
Title: [ANN][ICO]Block Bank - bespoke commercial banking
Body: Lising on LATOKEN Exchange pressrelease BBRT to Hit LATOKEN Exchange on 29th Nov Following their seamless ICO success, Blockbank are rocketing into the public eye by announcing their partnership with popular exchange, LATOKEN. Blockbank will be listing BBRT on LATOKEN from 29th November, starting at $4 a token.  The move to list on the rapidly growing crypto exchange comes in the wake of Blockbank’s smash hit success at their ICO - which closed having sold a whopping £12.83 million worth of tokens. Offering affordable commercial loans on a global-scale, Blockbank are leveraging blockchain technology to provide accessible funding to those who need it around the world. Having already built their own exchange (Blockbank Exchange) to trade their token (and others), Blockbank are now scouting to join other exchanges, emerging within those communities to provide new funding opportunities through BBRT.  LATOKEN – with a $30-45m daily turnover and over 80,000 registered users - is a dynamic first start for BBRT listings. With over 180 crypto pairs for trading, LATOKEN provides diverse interactions that enable onboarding of BBRT to snowball.  With the build of their commercial loan platform complete, Blockbank’s launch on LATOKEN comes at a great time for BBRT buyers. With the platform fully-functional already,Blockbank have closed £40m in commercial loans in the one month since the company launch in late October. With a £12.8 million success from the ICO and a completed bank acquisition under their belts, Blockbank are already becoming keen favourites within the banking industry globally and are showing sure signs of promise. AdamCuffe, co-founder and CEO of Blockbank, sees this as just the beginning, saying:  ‘Our main goal is to provide accessible funding to close the poverty gap on a global scale. We’ve already built the platform and showed it can work, so now we’re asking ourselves how we reach as many people as we can, to truly disrupt the banking industry and transform economies.’  With this in mind, Blockbank’s leap forward to join LATOKENS only serves as a further example of the dynamic ways in which Blockbank are seeking to engage their audience, disrupt the banking industry, and redistribute funding to close that funding gap – helping businesses thrive worldwide.  BBRT launches for $4 token on LATOKEN on 29th November 2018. Don’t miss out register using this link to trade BBRT.  Registration

Author: Watanabe1505_
Title: [ANN][ICO]Block Bank - bespoke commercial banking
Body: Afternoon Guys,  We have had a hectic week, we had been in Ukraine all week reviewing and testing our system ahead of Beta launch today.  Membership area The dev team finalised our system upgrade allowing more users to register and improve our debit and credit card payment facility. Users are now able to purchase tokens via the membership area with Crypto and fiat, upload Kyc, and withdraw their tokens to their own wallets.  You can login and check the system here https://theblock-bank.com/login  BlockBank Exchange Our Alpha version of the exchange is now live this is the first version of the exchange www.theblockbankexchange.com. The Block bank exchange is decentralized meaning it is p2p/ b2b. Users and businesses will utilize this exchange to settle fees for loans directly with each other. This evening the functional version will be uploaded. On Sunday we will be posting video and documentation as to how to place orders from the 28th of July. Please check the following link www.theblockbankexchange.com. Just as a reminder guys Beta version will be updated this evening.  Block Bank Commercial Lending The Alpha version of the Block bank commercial lending platform has been uploaded. Whilst in Ukraine we added additional portals to the system to collect the following data.  Authority to proceed  Terms of business  Proposal/ Business plan 3 years accounts Certificate of incorporation Share certificate Directorship Certificate 12 months bank statements YTD management account The above information is needed along with the fact find for user applications. The system will be testable for users on the 13th of July. Users will be able to submit applications for commercial loans, these applications and business will drive demand for your tokens.  Increased demand means improved value for your tokens  Between now and the 13th additional tests will be conducted before the fully functional system goes online on the 29th in line with the exchange from. The above information is needed along with the fact find for user applications. Please check out the Website site we would appreciate feedback. www.bbcl.io/  ICO Okay so I know this is the main topic which a lot of you are seeking clarity with From today June 29th ICO our is now live tokens are priced at 3 Usd equivalent. Users who have supported us from the beginning will understand how far we have come From today June 29th once the upload is complete users via the exchange users will be able to register their wallets.  From the 28th of July Users will be able to place orders on the exchange ahead of the token being tradable on the 29th of July. From the 29th of July tokens will be tradable on our exchange. Additional exchanges will be announced in the coming days. Over the next two weeks we will begin marketing with key press releases related to development of our project these will include •  Partnerships •  Funding •  Key dates in development •  Secondary market functions/ participants These four areas will add value and drive demand for our tokens. Guys if you have any further questions please ask in the group or give me a direct message Thanks again for all your support and keep an eye out on Sunday for videos on how to register Kind Regards. Adam

Author: Mirkic7
Title: [ANN][ICO]Block Bank - bespoke commercial banking
Body: Hello, here is good example from our white paper that will clarify things for you: Simon gets his referral code In Simon's network his friend Joe needs money in amount of $100,000 for his business Simon gives Joe his referral code and tells him to apply with Block Bank to get the money he needs Joe applies for the money he needs and is offered a commercial loan The Fees for Joe's commercial loan are $6169.00 Joe pays his fees and receives his commercial loan of $100,000.00 Simon is now entitled to his commission of $1850.7 which is 30% of the fees

Author: crevbi
Title: [ANN][ICO]Block Bank - bespoke commercial banking
Body: Block Bank Community update    Hello everyone, I wanted to post this on Monday night but our flight was delayed which meant we did not arrive until Tuesday lunch time in Bahrain,  we eneded up have to stay in transit for 11 hours which was not the ideal way to prepare for today, however we have a great afternoon and evening here at the conference and the event this evening held at the 21 Gallery.  This evening we met at a dinner exclusively for the keynote speakers and sponsors of the GCC Financial Forum which was organised by the EDB and Euromoney Instituition based in london. Amongst the key note speakers which included Lord Mervyn King, and Dr  Mohamed Aly El-Erian  there were senior  figures from the Bahrain Central Bank and the Bahrain Financial  Ministry Office, and senior bankers and financial innovators. We spoke about how we will be moving our license application forward and what we will be able to offer the region as a next gen commercial funding platform, and how Bahrain can support our project.  The Significance of Bahrain to block bank.  Bahrain has a strong history and reputation as a key financial centre in the Gulf. The country itself is going through a  transition which is being driven by Fintech Innovation. As some of you may know we were invited to the Capital Club here in November by our advisor Angela Morrison. That was where we met with David Parker The Executive Director of Financial Services Development on the EDB. David and his team have invited us to join the EDB and incubate the Banking entity we will be registering in Bahrain.   What does this mean?  Well this truly is a great opportunity for us as we have been invited to a EDB accelerator program overseen by C5 Accelerate (http://www.c5accelerate.com/.) C5 Accelerate is a London, Washington D.C., and Bahrain based technology investment firm. Its mission is to accelerate best-of-breed start-ups to meet the growth opportunity being created by the geographic expansion of AWS, the world’s leading cloud computing platform.The support on offer with C5 will be increbily valuable to our projects development and help secure a solid foundation on which to build in this region.  How will this benefit Block Bank and our community?  The approach from the regulators and the EDB mean that Block Bank will get a direct line of contact with the central bank of Bahrain as well as infrastructure support, business development expertise, office space and  a place in the Bahrain Fintech Sand box.  I have spoke before about how we anticipate growth in the Gulf region which is being supported by programs and regulatory changes.  This kind of growth is what will create funding opportunities for BlockBank and its users.  Tomorrow we are attending the second leg of the conference and in the evening  have been invited to the fintech innovation launch event. We will also be speaking directly with the Governor of the Central Bank and the Finance Minister of Bahrain about how best to structure our third banking license application.  I will provide another update tomorrow evening as to how we are progressing on this trip.  Thanks again for all your support and get in touch if you have any questions.  http://telegra.ph/Block-Bank-Community-update-03-13

Texничecкaя пoддepжкa пo элeктpoннoй пoчтe oтвeтилa дaжe быcтpo, нo пpoблeмy тaк и нe peшилa и бoльшe нe oтвeчaeт  Aдpec тpaнзaкции https://etherscan.io/tx/0x2ff5aa29e689d417fc1f1196d0b9b0af9ebdc8c778903c6d3e1e3fc7a1816fbc  Ha тoт мoмeнт пo кypcy ETH дoлжнo былo быть нa cчeтy oкoлo 275 BBRT Ha дaнный мoмeнт yжe oкoлo 350 BBRT.
